Attention
This Email is to bring to your notice that you have been personally accredited sole beneficiary to Late Eng Orven Caster,
He deposited the sum of $198,000,000.00 USD (One Hundred and Ninety-Eight Million United States Dollars Only.

Concerning my late client, Died without a WILL or  NEXT OF KIN This transaction is 100%.100 legitimate  And it's  like a gold coin 60/40 split: PLEASE CONTACT ME FOR MORE DETAILS WITH YOUR INFO IE.NAME,ADDRESS, PHONE NUMBER ,OCCUPATION,AGE.
Best Regards,
Thomas Lira.(BARR)
EMAIL:thomaslira@consultant.com
